attributes.action: Employ Craig Johnston as a consultant to draw a blueprint for the future of English Football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Craig Johnston's passionate speech about the state and future of English football is a stark reminder about the state of the English game. His passion and vision should be used to create a blueprint for the future of football. The goverment should step in and create a "football ministry" for the good of the country.
